analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x08958a59d0be14ea60b55ed34480579f072fc747.sol:
	Contract PointPowerCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x08958a59d0be14ea60b55ed34480579f072fc747.sol#174-177)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x08958a59d0be14ea60b55ed34480579f072fc747.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x08958a59d0be14ea60b55ed34480579f072fc747.sol#1): it allows old versions
